medical_history.history_of_present_illness: A flat, pigmented lesion on her left upper arm was noted approximately 1 year prior. Three months later, it began to itch and became slightly raised. Approximately 3 months before the current evaluation, the lesion started to bleed when scratched.
medical_history.past_medical_history: History of an ovarian cystectomy at age 25. No history of skin cancers.
medical_history.family_history: Siblings with nonmelanoma skin cancers. Maternal grandmother had breast cancer at 76 years, aunt at 65 years, cousin at 45 years; maternal grandfather had throat cancer in his 70s.
medical_history.social_history: Smoked for 10 years, quit at 29. Drinks alcohol occasionally.
